name: Tern
appearance: Lean and long-limbed, hair braided with tiny shells; eyes distant as the trench; throat marked with listening sigils.
character: Serene oracle who speaks in verses edged with warning; empathic yet guarded; believes truth is a tide, not a verdict.
talents: remembers long sequences of tones flawlessly
flaws: willing to withhold clarity for safety
prone to migraines near metal bells
dreams: End the false chorus luring juveniles to nets
Keep the Thalassarium free from crude politics
secrets: Keeps a ledger of confessions caught in the Council’s tuning passage
Once canceled a harbor alarm tone to test a captain’s honesty
Knows a drowned passage to a breathing bell below the reef
